text: Jonny Gomes (born November 22, 1980) is an American former professional baseball outfielder. He played for the Tampa Bay Devil Rays/Rays, Cincinnati Reds, Washington Nationals, Oakland Athletics, Boston Red Sox, Atlanta Braves, and Kansas City Royals. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.si.com/mlb/player/jonny-gomes Jonny Gomes Oakland Athletics 2014 SI.com Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:Tampa Bay Rays players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Washington Nationals players Category:Living people Category:1980 births Category:Tampa Bay Devil Rays players Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Kansas City Royals players
title: Jonny Gomes
